Package games

Class MixedStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.MixedStrategy

  • public final class MixedStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    A class the encapsulates the notion of a mixed strategy: the probability of playing each action, summing to 1

    Note: strategies are labeled 1..numActions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MixedStrategy(double[] probs)
      Create a new mixed strategy object representing these probabilities
      MixedStrategy(int nActions)
      Create a new mixed strategy for the given number of actions; defaults to uniform mixture
      MixedStrategy(int nActions, double initialValue)
      Create a new mixed strategy for the given number of actions; initial probability of each action is given

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumActions()
      Returns the number of actions represented
      double getProb(int action)
      Returns the probability of playing a particular action
      double[] getProbs()
      Return all action probabilities as an array
      boolean isValid()
      Determines whether the probabilities sum to 1 (within a tolerance of 0.01)
      void mixWithUniform(double delta) 
      void normalize()
      Normalize the vector to sum to 1
      void setBestResponse(double[] payoffs)
      Sets the mixed strategy to a uniform mixture over the actions that have the highest payoffs in the given payoff vector
      void setProb(int action, double prob)
      Set the probability of playing a given action
      void setProbs(double[] probs)
      Set all action probabilities
      void setProbs(MixedStrategy ms) 
      void setRandom()
      Resets the mixed strategy to a randomly-chosen strategy
      void setUniform()
      Resets the strategy to the uniform strategy
      void setZeros()
      Set all probabilities to zero
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the mixed strategy

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
